评论详情: THIS IS THE PULLOVER, SWEATER, TUNIC TO HAVE FOR ALL OCCASIONS. IT KEEPS YOU WARM WHEN THE WIND IS 20 - 30 MILES AN HOUR OR BELOW 30 DEGREE WEATHER. ALSO, IT LOOKS GOOD WHILE WEARING IT
Size is perfect
Love color, quality, and fit.
Super cute and cozy. I read some of the reviews to order smaller and glad I did. I normally wear XL, but orders a L and still felt a little big.
Love this sweater!  Fit is perfect for pairing with leggings!
It is a beautiful color, fits well. I feel so warm in it! Would buy again in another color.

I have never had great luck with this brand. I think I have ordered two or three items in the past and each and every time, they have arrived worn out and used. I don't have many good things to say unfortunately. The dress is short as others have noted.  If you are taller than 5'3" or 5'4" it is more of a bulky sweater, not a dress. I'm 5'9" and there is no way this thing is long enough.  It arrived used, the sleeves were stretched out and so was the hem. It was wadded up in a ball in a return bag and it smelled very strongly of someone's sandalwood perfume. It also had a couple of large holes in it as well. It is pretty apparent that someone wore it and somehow put some holes in it and decided they didn't want it anymore.  As for the quality, the color is more of a Heather grey than a dark grey. The weave is pretty thin- you can see right through the sweater. The material is also very scratchy and feels like it would be super uncomfortable to wear.
After several sweater dress purchases I finally found the right one!  This has just the right amount design, soft, right length and love the color!
So cute! Make sure you size down! In most things, I’m a size medium, but I read the reviews and ordered a small. It was still a little big, but so cute.
Everything that I could have ever wanted in an oversized sweater dress!  Cute with tights of leggings!  Definitely oversized, not itchy, very very comfy!!
It can be worn as a sweater dress or if you tug it up a bit it can just be worn as a very baggy sweater. Super cute and very warm.
This dress is super cute. It is a little short if you are planning to wear without leggings. I’m 5’8 and the dress hits my mid thigh.

It's ok. It's a loose weave that is kind of cheap for the price. Could unravel and could be warmer. Though its warm enough and as a dress it might be bad to be warmer. My biggest complaint is that the bottom bunches and rides up easily. It does not naturally want to stay down on it's own. It is better as an oversized sweater to go with leggings or pants than as a proper dress.
Very nice! Live the long and large sweater on my granddaughter.
I purchased this item on Dec 9 for Christmas. It arrived jan 9th i believe. The item is fine it's the service I'm unhappy with

评论用户: Good for cold drinks, not that great for hot drinks.
评论详情: Way too big for a size medium. Love the material, though.

I loooove this sweater dress. I have it in two colors and always want it in more. It's so flattering. My only mini-con is that sometimes a random thread will pull, but I think that's kind of a risk with any sweater dress. Love these!
Wore once, washed it separately on cold, came out of the washing machine frayed with string pulls on the sweater. Had to return.
Great Quality, perfect length to wear with thick tights. Color is the perfect red!  Soft to the touch!.

For the price, the quality is poor. It has snagged, the stitches are not tight and pull apart creating a hole affect. Love cable knit, but this was just poorly made. Really disappointed.  Cheap quality yarn.
I love it! The fabric was soft. It was easy to wash. Dried on low

评论概述: Pretty but not well made at all
评论详情: I wore this once and it was pretty but after one wear there were multiple strands of yarn pulled.

The sweater was perfect the first time I wore it. Once it went through the washer it seeemed to become shorter (need leggings or pants) and misshapen. If you know how to wash it without that I loved it the first time I wore it!
Quality was nice, but you need to size down on this dress. I am comfortable in a medium and to me this felt very large. Returning for a smaller size.
Soft, good fit.
It’s very cute but kinda itchy so I like the wear a long sleeve under it. Not sure if its worth $50 though I got a size small and I'm 5”2.
I absolutely love this sweater!! It is so comfortable. The fit is oversized, which is exactly what I was looking for.
Great sweater! It's comfy and soft. Make sure to iron or steam/wash it first. My photos turned out 🫶 great—oversized like I wanted.
I saw this exact sweater on Temu, but was hesitant to buy it so I bought it here instead and absolutely love it!  It is an excellent quality and I absolutely love the color.
This is NOT a dress. I am only 5’3” and it comes to 2 inches below my butt. For reference, I am 153 lbs and ordered a medium. It fit great except for the length- returned
Great quality, color, heavy weight and stretchy. They run really big! I have ordered several of them and I love them all.

If you stand normal, in front of the mirror, the sweater is not a flattering shape at all. If your plan on wearing it with a belt, it might help. But the point of a sweater dress, for me, is to not have something extremely tight on (like a belt). In the other reviews, I noticed the only people looking good in the dress were "posing", meaning they held their waist or stood at a certain angle to make the dress look better.

I originally ordered this dress in the wine red size large hoping for the oversized fit. The large fit me fine but was a little TOO over sized. It made me look boxy. And the wine red almost looked like a deep purple and like a brown in photos so I returned it and tried the beige color in a medium. The medium fit me WAY better and still has a bit of an oversized look while not making me look like a potato sack. So I would say to order your true size in this dress. I was worried the beige would be more brown then an off white, but it is the perfect off white I was hoping for. I am 5'6 and about 145lbs with longer legs for sizing reference.

The dress was short for my height to be honest, but some ladies might be okay with that. However, it was totally see through so if you like this style then I’d recommend wearing with leggings and an undershirt! The knitting leaves holes in the dress.

I normally wear a 2x (18/20) and I ordered an XL based off oversized description. The XL definitely fits PERFECTLY like my normal 2x. The only negative is that the knitting is not closely knit, therefore, leaving tiny holes in the front material/design. This may or may not be a problem for some people. You may choose to wear something underneath but it's not a deal breaker. Also, this will definitely be worn as a sweater and not as a dress. I am 5'5 and it is too short for a dress but my intentions were to wear as a sweater.

This dress is so comfortable and well worth the money. I have received tons of compliments on it and change it up with different hats, shoes and accessories so it never quite looks the same.  I love it!

I got this dress because I was dressing up as Yor from Spy Family and wanted a dress I could use even after Halloween. I got the basic red one, and let me tell you, it is BRIGHT red. It's nice though. Very baggy. I'd definitely say get one size below your normal size though because it looked very chunky on me when I ordered my actual size.
Great with tall boots for a dressy casual look!

Im 5'2 and about 200lbs. I was at first worried how it might look on me but honestly really happy overall. It is lose fitting, which was preferred. Even without layers it kept me warm in the frigid weather going from in and outdoors. Be mindful of things that can make it snag, after all it is a knitted sweater.
Really soft and oversized. Exactly what I wanted

评论概述: Cute but snagged within hours of wearing

It is soft however so that's a plus. But it does catch easily and will unravel. Not worth the price not even close to being worth the price. Super disappointed.

Bought this sweater dress for my Christmas party and was super excited based off of all the reviews I read. Pros: It’s thick and true to size. I am 5’5 170lbs ordered a Large. Con: The sweater literally just got delivered and I opened it immediately and it’s riddled with snags. Completely disappointed.

I am 5'9", 160ish lbs, and on the curvier side. My inseam is 33.5in. I had originally ordered a medium and it fit great besides falling right below my butt. If you're alright with being a little cautious then go for it. I ended up exchanging for a large and now it falls around mid-thigh. I use a belt around the waist to add a little dimension. Keeps you pretty toasty for a dress. I've gotten compliments about every time I wear it. Definitely recommend, just be aware of length when purchasing!
For the price I feel the quality should be way better. Material is boxy and cheap. Dress had no shape on me and was too short. For reference I’m 5’8

I love this sweater. It flattering and great quality. True to size. Worth the buy!

评论概述: I got married in this dress!!
评论详情: I ordered this dress for our civil ceremony, our little winter wedding. It was perfect! It is super thick and cozy. I wore with fleece lined tights that look sheer and was perfectly warm walking outside. I am tall (5’11) so it is a little short on me, hitting slightly under my butt. However I knew my tights weren’t see through, so I still felt confident. I ordered white, it is a nice cream color that isn’t too yellow. No weird smell at all.
Such a cute sweater dress ! True to size and very comfy

Perfect for the holidays. The dress is thicker than I expected but good quality. I would say maybe size down depending on your height as this dress is a little boxier than I expected. Happy with it nonetheless
The color was exactly what I wanted and the softness was more than expected. Amazing quality for the price. I would buy again!
I love it. But when I wore it I saw this on the side. It was broken. So sad do not waste your money for it.

I ordered a medium and should have gotten a small. It fits more like a large or even XL.
Good sweater, fit and material.

I’m torn because while the length and sleeves are a good fit, it seems very loose at the bottom, which makes it feel like I am wearing a potato sack. It actually looks like the material is stretched. I wonder if someone wore and returned this one?  If it were a tad smaller I would love it. Nice an warm though.

I love this sweater.... True to my size, oversized comphy and cozy casual weekend or dress it up a bit.. Very quick shipping and and nicely packaged.. I definitely would recommend this sweater to anyone who is looking to purchase it..
Delivered with spots
This sweater dress is not chunky like the name implies. Although it is soft, it is quite thin and see through in the chest area. Will be returning.
Quality not as good as expected wasn’t a thick white cable knit Irish style sweater dress I imagined it would be
Love it.  Runs a little big - went down a size.

I’m 5’ and 120lbs. The xs was way too big. Like wearing a potato sack. It was longer than expected and was right at my knees. Doesn’t look like the picture as far as how it would fit. I will be returning it.

评论用户: Not thick enough! Thinking of a return and refund! It’s a nice dress but the fabric could have been thicker to provide warmth!
评论详情: It a nice dress but not thick enough! Thickness needs to be improved to provide warmth which I was looking for but didn’t get! Thinking of a possible return and refund!
Nice material, chunky as excepted. I ordered the cream color and it’s thick enough that it’s not see through. Great length, hits right above the knee, and I’m 5’2”.

Very beautiful dress, it fits super well and is a bit stretchy. I think it’s worth the price but this is not for the tall gals. I’m not super but am tall and the dress was a BITTT small, would run up to my thighs at times. Everything else was perfect just the length.

Nice quality & fit but the red I received is not red.  It’s a pink color.  I initially ordered a medium in red & that color was a beautiful red.  But the medium was too big. I’m wondering if the red in small size is out of stock & they substituted. I returned it and will look for a different red sweater. Other than the color, I loved it

The quality of the sweater is very good,it's nice and thick and soft. HOWEVER, it came in a big zip lock bag that was torn open.. not box or sealed packaging.. I was very surprised it wasn't damaged or dirty!! 4 stars for the item 1 star for packaging..

I ordered an XS and it was still huge and unflattering. The fabric feels like a rough towel. Not a fan of this dress. I still gave it two stars bc I’m aware that some people like the extremely baggie look.
I loved wearing this dress for the holidays! It is long in the front but can be slightly short in the back. It is a good quality and worth the money. I even ordered it in another color!
Quality was very nice and fitted great! It does run a tad bit short, but would definitely purchase again.
Ordered for my company Christmas party and received this in with a giant hole in the sleeve. Dress is super cute other than that

A lot of people are saying it's way too short to wear as a dress, but I think it worked! I'm 5'5", so that def makes a difference, but it is just barely long enough to work and look really cute. The chunky knit is so cozy and seemingly well-made. It's very heavy too (definitely hot).
I love it! I’m 5’10 and was worried it would be too short but it’s perfect! The only slight problem is that it’s a tiny bit see through, but if you wear white or nude undergarments there’s no issue:)
Ordered this in the brown color since I liked it in blue. It came in WAY too short for a dress length and the color is not brown, it’s more of a burnt orange and not attractive.
The item has a hole on the right sleeve. The overall quality could be better. I have to return it.
Wore this dress to an outdoor, country wedding and it was so nice and comfortable for the chilly weather.

If you plan to wear this as a dress, you will need to wear opaque tights. I am 5’5 and 120 lbs. A size small looks cute when my arms are down. But, if you put your arms above your head to touch your hair or something, your butt will show! I had to return it.

评论概述: Super comfortable and cute sweater dress, runs large
评论详情: I love a good oversized sweater dress for fall. This blush color is very pretty. The sweater dress is very well-made and comfortable. I got a lot of compliments on the dress. When I buy an item like this, I definitely prefer it to be oversized. I ordered a medium, and it was almost too big. I will still wear the dress, but if I had to order again, I would order a size small and there would still be plenty of room. I’m 5’8”, 130lbs, 28” waist, 34” chest. Would definitely recommend.
This Sweater Dress is beautiful and very good quality. It's thick and very well made. I have so many compliments everytime I wear it
This sweater is really cute but it runs very large and snags easily.

Nice and warm and the color is great! It has a lot of stech and has the oversized feel I was looking for. It's a little to short for me  to wear as a dress, but I'm almost 6' tall. Still a great sweater.
Fits great Matched my boots perfectly Love the long length
I ordered four of the color choices. Sizes were perfect. Very comfortable. Colors are vibrant.
Be sure to size down. Wore this for Christmas photos and they turned out beautiful!

评论概述: Same size but huge difference in fit
评论详情: The first dress fit perfectly but had a hole where stitching was coming undone at the neck. The replacement garment said it was also a medium, but was significantly smaller- several inches shorter in length than the original, sleeves shorter and overall small. I returned the replacement garment and sewed the original back together. I am hoping the fix will hold.
I love this sweater dress so much that I will be ordering it in other colors. This is definitely my go-to outfit for cold nights. It can easily be dressed up or down.
Very nice and warm and comfy. Should have gone down a size as it is pretty big for a medium but still amazing.
Big and bulky and doesn’t fit like photo

Beautiful color, nice fit, sleeves a bit looser than expected but intend to wear often. Nice!
I loved the sweater dress, but it runs small. Definitely not for tall girls
